title: Krueger: The 'Gig Economy' Is Not Reflected In The Data
itunes:title: Krueger: The 'Gig Economy' Is Not Reflected In The Data
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Alan Krueger, Economics Professor at Princteon, says that we need to do a better job of measuring the so-called 'gig economy.'

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
